pr_title: DPC 726 bypass lookback for predefined organizations

timeline.bodyText: Method runAndMonitorExportJob has 6 arguments (exceeds 4 allowed). Consider refactoring.
timeline.author: codeclimate

timeline.message: Fixed NPE in mock blueButton Client

timeline.bodyText: are we guaranteed to always have an org ID on the job?

replies.bodyText: @jonfulk I want to say yes because the orgId in the table has a nullable = false constraint
